entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Android crash on navigate back from tab 2 without Shell #15687
  • Navigation to ContentPage make weird animation on IOS #15684
  • [Android]Entry is not unfocus when click in the button #15681
  • FileNotFoundException when I try to get the version of the assembly #15679
  • Windows: .Net 8 Preview 5 preventing me from debugging #15678
  • SelectionChangedCommand does not invoke in CollectionView twice when SelectionMode is Single on Windows #15677
  • Full-screening a window no longer removes its title-bar #15676
  • iOS app crashing on device at startup with .NET 8 preview 5 #15673
  • Scaling of root VisualElement is ignored #15672
  • MAUI DisplayAlert not modal on Android 10 #15671
  • [Android] Image with FontImageSource shows nothing after switching between the applications #15669
  • invalid GradientBrush color causes crash #15667
    Backlog
  • MAUI - CollectionView Pre Select Item background color not change on windows #15666
  • BindableLayout should pass through items that are already Views #15665
  • A11y_.NET Core_MAUI_Recipe App_Your Recipe_Keyboard : The "More options" button is not accessible by keyboard. #15664
  • A11y_.NET Core MAUI_Recipe App_Edit Recipe_Screenreader : The "Review" Label is not announced by Narrator and NVDA Screenreader #15663
  • WebAuthenticator does not extract parameters contained in a fragment (regression) #15661

Closed

  • Blazor hybrid: No content in Webbrowser after some time in background #15520
  • Switching Current Application After Initialization #11977
    Backlog
  • Android: Open App from background -> no shell navigation #11656
    Backlog
  • [Android] CarouselView loses Snap behavior using Loop and setting spacing #13053
    Backlog
  • Remove NewsstandKit Dependency to build targeting iOS17 #15660
  • Background color not changing when setting visual state and command on button #15055
    Backlog
  • Visual Studio 17.6.2 breaks MAUI on Android builds #15510

PullRequests

Created

  • [Windows] Fix issues setting Shell TabBar appearance #15690
  • Correctly identify headers/footers when using UngroupedItemsSource #15688
  • Manual updates 20230615 Android ecosystem nugets bumped #15685
    area/platform
  • IsNullOrEmpty for Paint not returning true if Colors are not set #15668
    community ✨
  • [essentials] ensure WebUtils.ParseQueryString captures fragment parameters #15662
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨

Merged

  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.1 to 7.0.3 #15680
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [net8] Merge main to net8.0 #15674
  • Fix sizing issues with CollectionView on Windows #15587
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [net7.0] Handle Grid * expansion when size is larger than minimum, but less than sufficient to display full size #15653
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [net7.0] [macOS] Display alert by Window #15651
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [net7.0] Catch InvalidProtocolBufferException creating EncryptedSharedPreferences #15650
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Bump System.Text.Json from 7.0.2 to 7.0.3 #15641
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.WindowsAppSDK from 1.3.230502000 to 1.3.230602002 #15639
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [main] Updates to new released packages #15648
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Fix IsSpellCheckEnabled #15459
    area/controls 🎮
  • Fix issues setting Shell TabBar appearance #15447
    t/bug, t/breaking 💥, platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [Windows/macOS] Implement menu key accelerators #14740
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, control-menubar
  • Add GotoAsync overload for single use query parameters #15585
    area/shell 🐢
  • [uitests] Run Control gallery tests with cake on iOS and Android #15657
    do-not-merge, area/testing
  • [Windows] Fix CollectionView broken test #15584
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/collectionview 📃
  • Fix CharacterSpacing on SearchBar on iOS to be actually set #15596
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • Just run the pack every time #15588
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net7.0] Make CollectionView on iOS measure to content size #15652
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/collectionview 📃
  • Windows UI tests for CI #15629
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, area/testing
  • Wrap Image with a grid on Windows so that it is centered with AspectFill #15122
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-image
  • Hook up ScrollViewer event tracking in Windows CollectionView #15555
    area/collectionview 📃
  • Set the SafeAreaInset Property with updated value #15512
    area/layout 🔲, platform/iOS 🍎
  • Add SwipeItems to LogicalChildren #13864
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • Publish ControlGallery to run tests #15194
    area/testing
  • [X] Optimize OnPlatform element syntax #5611
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️, .NET 8 Planning
  • Style specificity #13818
    area/Xaml </>
  • Fix DataTrigger behavior that can cause some strange inconsistencies #15655
    community ✨
